thread.title: Michael O'Brien
thread.title_full: HelloFresh US reviewed by Michael O'Brien

author: Michael O'Brien
title: Michael O'Brien
text: So far I have liked almost every meal I chose. They are pretty easy recipes but we've still struggled a little with some vague wording but that's all part of the learning experience. Sometimes I do wish they were a little faster because we don't start cooking until 6 or 7 sometimes which leads to eating right before bed. The cards might say 35 minutes but it really means 50-60 for inexperienced cooks
